titles.title: Savior Like A Shepherd Lead Us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Savior, like a shepherd lead us; newline Much we need Your tender care. newline In Your pleasant pastures feed us, newline For our use Your folds prepare. newline Blessed Jesus, Blessed Jesus, newline You have bought us: Yours we are.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We are Yours; in love befriend us, newline Be the guardian of our way; newline Keep Your flock, from sin defend us, newline Seek us when we go astray. newline Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus, newline Hear Your children when we pray.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You have promised to receive us, newline Poor and sinful though we be; newline You have mercy to relieve us, newline Grace to cleanse, and power to free. newline Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus, newline Early let us turn to You.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Early let us seek Your favor, newline Early let us do Your will; newline Blessed Lord and only Savior, newline With Your love our spirits fill. newline Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus, newline You have loved us; love us still.
